label: 院宮
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: All those other than the Sovereign (Tennō ), himself. Namely, the Three Empresses (Sangū ), Crown Prince (Tōgū ), Imperial Concubines (Nyōgo ), and the Retired Members of the Imperial Family (In ). [天皇、三宮、東宮、女御、院]
